translation: Wearing divine garlands and apparel, anointed with divine unguents, the all-wonderful, resplendent Being is endless with faces on all sides.
commentary: 11.11 wearing divine garlands (necklaces) and apparel? anointed with divine unguents? the allwonderful the allwonderful? God resplendent? Infinitely endless? Visvatomukham with faces on all sides.Commentary Visvatomukham With faces on all sides? as He is the Self of all beings.Therefore God. Also means resplendent.Anantam Endless. He Who is free from the three kinds
